verb.definition: Grant to (someone) the use of (something) on the understanding that it shall be returned.
verb.example: I will lend you my car.

verb.definition: Contribute or add (something, such as a quality) to.
verb.example: The presence of the mayor lent dignity to the occasion.

noun.example: Can I have a lend of your bike?

usage_examples: Can you lend me a hand?
